text: aur jis tarah log apanee bhalaee ke lie jaldee kar baithe hain usee tarah agar khuda unakee sharaaraton kee saza mein buraee mein jaldee kar baithata hai to unakee maut unake paas kab kee aa chukee hotee magar ham to un logon ko jinhen (marane ke baad) hamaaree huzooree ka khataka nahin chhod dete hain ki vah apanee sarakashee mein aap saragirada rahen
